collection.name: Magical Girl
The Knight of Despair
collection.openText: All that remains is the hollow pride of a weathered knight.

specialTipSize.specialTip: The first employee who completes their work with a Good result will receive $0’s blessing. (From then on, the employee will be referred to as O-01-73-1.)
O-01-73-1 could only aid in suppressing Abnormalities. Furthermore, thanks to the blessing, RED, WHITE, and BLACK damage dealt to them was halved, however, PALE was doubled.
$0’s blessing dissipated when O-01-73-1 died or panicked. After the blessing was gone, a new employee could receive it.
When O-01-73-1 panicked, $0 escaped from its Containment Unit. The same results occurred when O-01-73-1 died.
